charges.charge_description: Did knowingly possess with intent to distribute approx. 2047 kilos of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) and 18:2. Date of Offense: June 30, 1997. Penalty: Not less than 10 years nor more than life impirsonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence and a fine of up to $4 million at least 5 years SRT, $100 Special Assessment. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct, 2: 40 mos., 5 yrs. SRT, $100 fine, and $100 spec. assmt. (2)

charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute approximately 2623 kilos of marijuana. 21:846 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A). Date of Offense: June 30 1997. Penalty: Not less than 10 yrs. nor more than life imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence and a fine of up to $4 million, at least 5 years SRT, $100 Special Assessment. (1)
